title: A Day at the Circus: A Children's Book About Circus and Circus Animals
description: Enjoy reading a entertaining day at the circus for the children in this delightfully illustrated picture book This book features vivid, full-color layoutsReading this book with your child would help the little one learn of going to see a CircusVarious animals in a circusTricks performed at the circus
author: Amelia Picklewiggle
